detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in sturdy organic cotton jersey with elastication at the back of the waist and straps with adjustable buttoning. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Knee-length, short-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
Short-sleeved jersey nightdress with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short V-neck dress in large-sequined mesh with spaghetti straps and wider decorative ties at the back. Jersey lining.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Top in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in softly draping denim with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the back and wide ties at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.

Tailored, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric. Concealed elastication at the waist and a concealed zip and two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at one side. Side pockets with decorative metal studs, fake welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, chest pockets and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a lightly brushed finish. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with a decorative knot detail at the front. Lined at the top.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves. Button placket with a small appliqué and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Fitted jumper in soft, fine, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with hole-knit details at the front, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a jacquard-knit motif, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves. Roll-edge neckline with a sewn-on bow, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a plumeti cotton weave with a boat neck and buttons down the front. Gently tailored bodice and puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Short skirt in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Second layer of fabric on the top with gathered seams at the sides and back to create a draped effect. Lined.
Short dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and two flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Bikini top in lace with a tie detail at the front, underwired, moulded padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, straps that tie at the back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short jacket in imitation suede with a small stand-up collar with a press-stud, and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, one inner pocket and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Trousers in a soft weave made from viscose and recycled polyester. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 55x160 cm.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Metal rings in various designs.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Fitted, single-breasted jacket in a wool blend with satin lapels and a concealed button at the front. Flap welt front pockets, an inner pocket with a button, concealed fasteners at the cuffs and a high-cut back vent. Lined.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Slim-fit, denim-look leggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist.
Net bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Size approx. 40x45 cm.
Striped leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, wrapover top, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt.
Leggings in jersey containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist and stripes down the sides of the legs.

Round-necked top in an airy brocade weave with a shimmering gold-coloured pattern. Hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication. Pleat at the wait to create a fitted silhouette. Partly lined in satin.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft fine knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sandals in patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate with a small loop at the back and straps with hook and loop fasteners. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester. Moulded insoles with a textured pattern to give the feet a better grip, and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a V-neck, button placket and wide, ribbed hem.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in organza with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back.
Cotton jersey shorts with side pockets and an elasticated waist with a frill trim and bow.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a wide metal chain at the front and elastic at the back with a metal hook fastening. Width 5 cm.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and hem. Unlined.

Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a motif on the front, cut-out sections on the shoulders and short raglan sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-shaped opening and buttons at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Fitted dress in stretch velour with a small stand-up collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, an open back, long sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in a soft silk blend with a round neck and concealed zip at the back. Long, puff sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a shirt collar in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop with a rubber print at the back. Mesh insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey in a straight style with slits in the sides.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation suede with buttons down the front and a frill trim at the top. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, wide jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a vertical drawstring down the front.
